title: Thai Curry Powder
source: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
categories: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
ingredients: - 6 cinnamon sticks, pounded into small pieces
directions: 1. Combine the cumin, coriander, star anise, cinnamon, and cloves in a large sauté pan and toast over low heat until fragrant. Remove and let cool.
2. Transfer the spices to a spice grinder, in batches, and grind to a fine powder.
3. Pour the spices into a bowl, add the turmeric, and mix to combine. Store in a container with a tight-fitting lid in a cool, dark place for up to 6 months.
